rule.condition: implementationStart in $L.file~=implementationStart in $L.file.save or implementationEnd in $L.file~=implementationEnd in $L.file.save
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: implementationStart in $L.file~=implementationStart in $L.file.save or implementationEnd in $L.file~=implementationEnd in $L.file.save)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"implementationStart in $L.file~=implementationStart in $L.file.save or implementationEnd in $L.file~=implementationEnd in $L.file.save"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send Notification: "CHM Implementation" (when ( Expression: implementationStart in $L.file~=implementationStart in $L.file.save or implementationEnd in $L.file~=implementationEnd in $L.file.save))
